content.question: Which of the following characteristics best fits a catch-all party?

choices.label: Presenting voters with an ideological viewpoint that envisions the role of government in a consistent manner on all issues
A singular focus on one political issue that it considers most important and in need of government attention
A willingness to change its position on a given issue to encourage more voters to support it in any given election
The transnational pursuit of power by presenting a consistent message to voters in multiple countries

content.answer: A willingness to change its position on a given issue to encourage more voters to support it in any given election

unit.text: 4: Party and Electoral Systems and Citizen Organizations
